Articles.Content:
hey kerbonauts,

i just installed the interstellar mod and when i build a ship in the VAB, and when i go to the launchpad the whole ship falls through the floor. has anyone a solutiom for this meltdown syndrome??? thanks
Moved to the proper Support forum, please read the sticky thread and provide the information requested

Are you using the 0.23 version of interstellar?

The 64-bit of KSP have some bugs, use 32-bit instead.

Here's the latest (unofficial) update by WaveFunctionP, works with 0.24.2 32-bit:

https://github.com/WaveFunctionP/KSPInterstellar/releases

I'd recommend using a texture compression mod if you have other part mods too.
